metadata.title: CVE-2016-2147 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Integer overflow in the DHCP client (udhcpc) in BusyBox before 1.25.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a malformed RFC1035-encoded domain name, which triggers an out-of-bounds heap write.

criterions.comment: busybox package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.27.2-1ubuntu3').
